headline: IBM Elects Ramon L. Laguarta to its Board of Directors
summary: The IBM (NYSE: IBM) board of directors has elected Ramon L. Laguarta to the board, effective March 1, 2026.

headline: Will Mixed Analyst Signals on Growth and Promotions Change Celsius Holdings' (CELH) Investment Narrative?
summary: Recent commentary from NewBridge Asset Management and Zacks has put Celsius Holdings in focus, highlighting expected earnings and revenue for an upcoming report while also flagging concerns around slowing energy drink category growth, heavier promotions, and revised sales and earnings expectations tied to PepsiCo’s inventory actions. This mix of optimism about Celsius’ historically strong expansion and caution from institutional investors exiting positions underscores a growing debate over...

headline: Institutional Exit Tests Celsius Holdings Valuation As Growth Slows
summary: NewBridge Large Cap Growth Equity Strategy has exited its position in Celsius Holdings (NasdaqCM:CELH). The investor cited a slowdown in growth across the energy drink category and changing industry conditions. Concerns included heavier promotional activity and the effect of PepsiCo inventory adjustments on Celsius. Celsius Holdings, the energy drink company behind the Celsius brand, sits at the intersection of performance beverages and health focused marketing. Recent commentary around...

headline: Delivra Health Brands Announces Appointment of New Director
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - January 30, 2026) - Delivra Health Brands Inc. (TSXV: DHB) (OTCQB: DHBUF) ("Delivra Health", "Delivra" or the "Company"), a consumer packaged goods company uniquely positioned in the health and wellness sector, is pleased to announce the appointment today of John Barrett as a director of the board of directors of the Company (the "Board"). Mr. Barrett was previously a senior executive with Frito Lay and PepsiCo, and served as Chief Commercial...
